attributes.action: give tax exemption for goods vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this country taxes goods vehicles more than any other eu country both with fuel duty and road fund tax.the cost of which are past on to the customer.eu haulers pay nothing to this country when they enter the uk, yet they can drive around making coll & dell on cheap euro fuel brought before entering the uk, what happened to the brit tax they promised? please vote on this to bring down uk costs to uk citizens

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
